channel.title: Server and Client Help
channel.description:
Hi, I'm gtree01 or Ghost. Moreover I used to program/code RSPS back in 2008-10. At that time the craze was like 317,459 and 508's were revolutionary. Anyways I'm back wish I could remember my old login details. Well here's the thing. I downloaded Vistex Source/Client. I fixed the client error most leechers are getting and ran into another.
[IMG]http://i1235.photobucket.com/albums/ff426/GhostCrusaderX/server.png[/img]
This is what happens. Please help! I have countd on Mopar before and I am counting on you all again!
EDIT: I have cleaned up the code in a multitude of locations. Still doesn't work. It loads localhost on start up. I can copy my client.java if anyone is interested in helping...

item.title: Server and Client Help
item.dc:creator: @gtree01 gtree01
item.description:
@gtree01 wrote:

Hi, I’m gtree01 or Ghost. Moreover I used to program/code RSPS back in 2008-10. At that time the craze was like 317,459 and 508’s were revolutionary. Anyways I’m back wish I could remember my old login details. Well here’s the thing. I downloaded Vistex Source/Client. I fixed the client error most leechers are getting and ran into another.
